item.title: MALVERN BANCORP INC 10-K
item.description: MALVERN BANCORP INC, which is in the Savings Institution, Federally Chartered [6035] industry, SEC 10-K filing on December 27, 2022 had 42923 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
